text.text: How can you print a patient invoice in ZOLL Billing?

text: To print a patient invoice in ZOLL Billing, you can go to the Account page and click the "Patient responsibility" tab. Under "Current patient responsibility", click Print patient responsibility. You can also go to the Claim page and click Print 1500.

text.text: Where can you find the option to print a patient invoice on the Account page?

text: To print a patient invoice in ZOLL Billing, you can go to the Account page and click the "Patient responsibility" tab. Under "Current patient responsibility", click Print patient responsibility. You can also go to the Claim page and click Print 1500.

text.text: What steps are involved in adding a note to an in-house patient invoice?

text:
To add a note to an in-house patient invoice, you can follow these steps:

1. Go to the Account page and click the "Patient responsibility" tab.
2. Under "Current patient responsibility", click the "Notes" tab.
3. Click the "Add note" button and enter the note.
4. Click the "Save" button.

text.text: Where can you find the option to add a note to a patient invoice on the Account page?

text: To add a note to a patient invoice, you can go to the Accounts page and click the Notes tab. Then, click Add an account note.

text.text: Can you describe the process of adding a note to an in-house patient invoice step by step?

text:
To add a note to an in-house patient invoice, you can follow these steps:

1. Go to the Account page and click the "Patient responsibility" tab.
2. Under "Current patient responsibility", click the "Notes" tab.
3. Click the "Add note" button and enter the note.
4. Click the "Save" button.

text.text: What types of notes can be added to a patient statement?

text: The following types of notes can be added to a patient statement: Patient statement note Final statement message Payment options Customer service Air ambulance US Department of Transportation statement Deductible monitoring

text.text: How can you edit or delete an existing patient statement note?

text: You can edit or delete an existing patient statement note.

text.text: What does it mean to "pin" an account note, and where does the pinned note appear?

text: Pinning a note means that the note will display at the top of the patient's account page. The note will appear with a "Acknowledge" button to ensure that users read it.

text.text: How can users acknowledge a pinned note on the patient's account page?

text: To acknowledge a pinned note, click on the pin icon. Once you acknowledge a pinned note, it will be temporarily removed from the pinned notes section for the duration of your current session in the claim. However, if you leave the claim and return at a later time, the acknowledged note will reappear in the pinned notes section.

text.text: Include a note with a patient statement you are printing in-house

text: To include a note with a patient statement you are printing in-house, you can do the following: 1. Go to the account level for the patient. You can do that by entering the last name of the patient in the search field and then clicking their name in the search results. 2. On the Accounts page, click the Notes tab. 3. Click Add an account note.
